markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jungle Strider](/Feats.aspx?ID=5695) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tripkee" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=793" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 38 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles. You ignore [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) in forests and jungles. In addition, when you use the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) skill to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of plant material, you aren't off-guard, and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.
name: Jungle Strider

summary_markdown: You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Jungle Strider Source Player Core 2 pg. 38 1.1 --- You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles. You ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to Balance on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of plant material, you aren't off-guard, and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.
